MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 and CW7 postcode area of Nantwich and Winsford, affecting properties in a widespread area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:18 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to repair a grounded overhead cable. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Due to the extent of the work required we now expect the power to be restored by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:27 am on 13th January, 2021.
